name: Protect the Light!
description:
You must protect the light! On this island, a sole construction light fixture rests ready to tear through the forces of evil. As the last lighthouse keeper of Skellig Michael, you must battle evil enemies with the power of light (and a sword). Not only that, but the light you shine at your enemies heals you too! If either you die or your light breaks, its game over. Good luck! 

Controls: One hand using WASD and Space, other hand using arrow keys.

Programmed by Alan Healy, Music by Facundo Gerbino (@Synesthesiated), and art by David Fournet.
